The Oblitercons (Oblitertron):


Oblitertron watched events slowly, easily =
sensing the rising fear and 
"edginess" in most of the Maximals.  It excite=
d his mind composed of 5 
Oblitercons, though only one was in total control=
. 
    Seeing a large robot beginning to approach him, though it was a beas=
t, 
Oblitertron raised his laser pistol, aiming at the beast mode.  Getting=
 ready 
to pull the trigger, "he" stopped when hearing Iron Raptor speak.  =


-=A7=A7- Dark One, in control of Oblitertron, was about to lower his weap=
on, when 
inside Oblitertron's mind, in a blue and red vortex, a pair of re=
d hands 
grabbed Dark One, throwing him out, Pyro taking control -=A7=A7-

=
Oblitertron smiled slightly, looking around.  Raising his pistol, he fired =
a 
single shot off at Iron Raptor, an optic blast off at Tavatron and Dinob=
ot, 
though it had a low chance of actually hitting, but Oblitertron's not =
real 
intelligent "mind" didn't care as long as something happened.  "WE LI=
VE FOR 
OBLITERATION!  DIE MAXIMALS!" his gargantuan voice boomed.
